description_html:
Luminous hues and brilliant patterns deliver all the mystery and beauty of deep space exploration in this cosmos-inspired Robert Allen Contract collection. Rigorously texted to meet or exceed industry standards, and with a stain repellent finish on all upholstery fabrics, including velvet, this performance line pushes the boundaries for durability and ingenuity.

Capturing the intergalactic drama of supernovas, sonic booms and cosmic dust clouds, high-contrast dark and lustrous light hues in fine jacquard constructions create striking fabrics for drapery use.

From brilliant meteor showers to dimpled lunarscapes, fading eclipses to laser-thin light beams, our upholstery designs rely on a variety of scales, textures and finishes to achieve an otherworldly effect.
